Text:
Well, I appreciate the movies. But I'd wish Hajime and others could leave at least the subtitles untouched. Unfortunately, the world isn't perfect: there are people out there who don't speak spanish ... yet.
Maybe somebody should explain that in Spanish. Nice and polite, if possible.

Thanks for this!

P.S. I second the last comment. (although some of those invectives must surely be made up?)
